text-fields.heading: An online donation platform
text-fields.heading-bold: with a maximum degree of transparency
text-fields.activity-section-text: Podkrepi.BG is an association of professionals united by the idea of creating a free and completely transparent online donation platform, which can be used freely by citizens and organizations.
text-fields.team-section-text: We are a group of volunteers united by the idea of improveing charity in Bulgaria and supporting good causes and the fight for a better life.
